physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Denver Section Council of Jewish Women picnic for adults of National Jewish Hospital held at Eldorado Spgs, Colo.; July 24, 1936; #1117.''

mods.abstract: Several unidentified men and women pose in front of a car in Eldorado Springs, Colorado during a Denver Section Council of Jewish Women picnic for adults of National Jewish Hospital. Many of them are eating popsicles.

name.namePart: National Council of Jewish Women.--Denver Section
